item.title: Setup AD in Google
item.description: How to Setup Google Ad Manager, Keep AdSense, and Earn More Revenue in Five Steps Intowow Intowow · Follow 5 min read · Jun 13, 2019 7 For publishers who got started with monetization by utilizing Google AdSense as their self-serve advertising platform, the time often comes when site growth and/or direct advertising opportunities prompt a desire for more features, greater flexibility and control, or just more revenue. When any of these feelings start cropping up, it’s time to consider upgrading to Google Ad Manager.
